translation.heydjoe_description: Hey Djoe ! is a multimedia messaging system available under a free license (GPLv3)
translation.about_free_description: You are free to use, copy, study and to modify this system.
translation.etherpad_description:
A document Etherpad, often shortened to 'pad', is an text document editable
by several people in real time on multiple remote workstations.
translation.etherpad_document_name: Name of the document to open or create (3 chars min.) :
translation.invite_you_to_share_pad: invite you to share an Etherpad document.
translation.do_you_want_to_view_screen_of: Do you want to see screen of
translation.want_to_invite_you_in_videoconference: invite you to participate in a videoconference.
translation.install_chrome_screen_sharing_extension: Install the Chromium/Chrome extension for screen sharing
translation.install_chrome_extension_intro: To capture and share your screen carefully follow the following steps. These operations are not necessary to receive the other user screen.
translation.open_dialog_in_chrome: Open this dialog box in the Chromium/Chrome browser
translation.click_here_to_download_extension: Click here to download the extension
translation.then_save_it_in_your_system: then save there in the 'Download' from your system
translation.then_go_to_settings: And type in the address bar: chrome://extensions
translation.drop_extension_on_page: Drag and drop the file '#######.crx' you just downloaded on the setting page
translation.confirm_extension_installation: Accept the installation of the extension. After installing the extension, you can delete the downloaded file.
translation.invite_you_in_conversation: invite you to participate in a conversation.
translation.connection_if_problem_persist: Connection failed. If this problem persists, refresh the page and try again.
translation.terminate_all_and_reset_multimedia: End all calls and reset the multimedia system
translation.want_to_invite_you_again: want to invite you again in videoconference.
translation.delete_many_description: You will remove these items from your contact list. This action is irreversible. All related chat windows will be closed.
translation.you_must_select_one_person: You have to select at least one user
translation.invite_you_to_share_etherpad: invite you to share an Etherpad document
translation.you_must_select_at_least_one_element: You have to select at least one element
translation.are_you_sure_to_clean_all_notifications: Are you sure you want to dismiss all notifications?
translation.unknown_sender_confirmation:
You have received a message from an unknown sender: __user__
Do you want to display it ?
translation.you_will_discover_interface: You will discover the main elements of the main interface.
translation.conversation_panel_description: Conversation panel is available at the bottom of the screen. Click on the blue banner or on the cross to hide it.
translation.conversation_panel_description_2: From this item, you can see your contacts, start a discussion or a video conference.
translation.multimedia_panel_description: Multimedia panel is available at the top of the screen. Click its icon to bring up or hide.
translation.multimedia_panel_description_2: On this panel you can view the video streams of your contacts and other media.
translation.sidebar_filters_description: Filters used to display or hide users and threads
translation.roster_description: Contact List shows you which users are connected to you.
translation.roster_description_2: These users are aware of your presence, and are notified when you send them a message.
translation.main_menu_description: main menu allows you to interact with your contacts.
translation.main_menu_description_2: You can create conversations, call your contacts or view your notifications.
translation.selection_button_description: select button allows you to select contacts with which interact.
translation.selection_button_description_2: The mode selection allows you to select multiple contacts.
translation.settings_description: Settings menu allows you to change the behavior of the mail.
translation.settings_description_2: You can mute messaging, notifications hide or block video calls.
translation.status_panel_description: Status panel allows you to change the way others perceive you.
translation.status_panel_description_2: From this panel you can also disconnect.
translation.end_of_interface_visit: This is the end of the visit !
translation.local_storage_warning: Local storage of your browser is unavailable. Use a compatible browser (Firefox, Brave, Opera, Chrome) and a secure connection (https: // ...).
translation.client_slave_warning: Messaging is available in another tab
translation.error_while_accessing_camera_and_micro: Error accessing the camera and microphone
translation.user_try_to_share_screen_but_only_chromi: __user__ tried to invite you to share their screen, but this option is only available on Chrome or Chromium
translation.user_try_to_share_screen_but_media_disab: __user__ tried to invite you to share their screen, but the multimedia calls are disabled
translation.received_screensharing_invitation_but_ou: You received a screen sharing invitation, but it is outdated
translation.user_tried_to_invite_you_in_videoconfere: '__user__ tried to invite you to a videoconference, but the multimedia calls are disabled
translation.you_received_videoconference_invitation_: You have received an invitation to a video conference __user__, but it is invalid
translation.access_camera_micro_refused: Access to the camera and microphone refused
translation.user_do_not_participate_videoconference: __user__ is not involved in the current video conference
translation.videoconference_have_been_canceled_by: The videoconference to was canceled by __user__
translation.screen_sharing_will_soon_begin: Screen sharing is about to begin ...
translation.unable_to_catch_screen_please_allow_or_i: Unable to access your screen, please allow access, install the extension if necessary and try again
translation.internet_explorer_videoconference_warnin: Videoconferencing is not available with Internet Explorer. Use Firefox, Brave, Opera or Chromium/Chrome
translation.screensharing_use_chromium_or_chrome: Screen sharing is not available with your browser, use Chromium or Chrome
translation.user_tried_to_contact_you_but_media_disa: __user__ tried to contact you, but multimedia calls are disabled
translation.file_transfert_incoming_but_not_implemen: File transfer on arrival. This feature is not yet available
translation.cannot_perform_action_before_end_multime: You can not do this until you have finished all your multimedia calls
translation.tried_to_contact_you_but_you_are_occupie: __user__ tried to contact you but you are busy
translation.no_response_after_n_seconds_cancel_call: No response from __user__ after __time__ s., call is dropped
translation.empty_roster_message: Your contact list is blank, invite new contacts !
translation.not_a_contact_chat_warning: is not in your contacts. This user may be disconnected or may refuse to see your messages.
translation.you_receive_message_from_unknown_user: You received a message from an unknown user:
translation.TODO_TODO_TODO: Check if all messages below are ncessary
translation.your_buddy_closed_the_private_connection: Your contact closed the private connection.
translation.you_have_only_a_subscription_in_one_way: You only have a one-way subscription.
translation.your_message_wasnt_send_please_end_your_: Your message was not sent. Please end your private conversation.
translation.your_buddy_closed_the_private_conversati: Your contact closed the private conversation! You should do the same.
translation.Creating_your_private_key_: Creating your private key; this may take a while.
translation.Authenticating_a_buddy_helps_: Authenticating a contact helps ensure that the person you are talking to is really the one they claim to be.
translation.How_do_you_want_to_authenticate_your_bud: How do you want to authenticate {{bid_name}} ({{bid_jid}})?
translation.Question: Question
translation.To_verify_the_fingerprint_: To verify the fingerprint, contact your contact via some other trustworthy channel, such as the telephone.
translation.To_authenticate_using_a_question_: To authenticate using a question, pick a question whose answer is known only you and your contact.
translation.To_authenticate_pick_a_secret_: To authenticate, pick a secret known only to you and your contact.
translation.Type_in_the_full_username_: Type in the full username and an optional alias.
translation.You_are_about_to_remove_: You are about to remove {{bid_name}} ({{bid_jid}}) from your contact list. All related chats will be closed.
translation.Sorry_we_cant_authentikate_: Authentication failed with the chat server. Maybe the password is wrong?
translation.Should_we_notify_you_: Should we notify you about new messages in the future?
translation.Please_accept_: Please click the "Allow" button at the top.
translation.Not_one_of_our_latest_keys: Not one of our latest keys.
translation.TITLE: Job title
translation.A_fingerprint_: A fingerprint is used to make sure that the person you are talking to is who he or she is saying.
translation.Sorry_your_buddy_doesnt_provide_any_info: Sorry, your contact does not provide any information.
translation.Please_allow_access_to_microphone_and_ca: Please click the "Allow" button at the top, to allow access to microphone and camera.
translation.Do_you_want_to_accept_the_call_from: Do you want to accept the call from
translation.Video_call_not_possible: Video call not possible. Your contact does not support video calls.

muc_hidden.description: can not be found through search

muc_membersonly.description: you need to be on the member list

muc_moderated.description: only persons with "voice" are allowed to send messages

muc_nonanonymous.description: your jabber id is exposed to all other occupants

muc_passwordprotected.description: you need to provide the correct password

muc_persistent.description: will not be destroyed if the last occupant left

muc_semianonymous.description: your jabber id is only exposed to room admins

muc_temporary.description: will be destroyed if the last occupant left

muc_unmoderated.description: everyone is allowed to send messages

muc_unsecured.description: you need no password to enter

translation.Could_load_only: Could load only __count__ rooms for autocomplete
translation.muc_explanation: Please enter room name and optional a nickname and password to join a chat
translation.Room_not_found_: A new room will be created
translation.muc_removed_kicked: You have been kicked from the room
translation.muc_removed_info_kicked: __nickname__ has been kicked from the room
translation.muc_removed_banned: You have been banned from the room
translation.muc_removed_info_banned: __nickname__ has been banned from the room
translation.muc_removed_affiliation: You have been removed from the room, because of an affiliation change
translation.muc_removed_info_affiliation: __nickname__ has been removed from the room, because of an affiliation change
translation.muc_removed_membersonly: You have been removed from the room, because the room has been changed to members-only and you are no member
translation.muc_removed_info_membersonly: __nickname__ has been removed from the room, because the room has been changed to members-only and you are no member
translation.muc_removed_shutdown: You have been removed from the room, because the MUC service is being shut down
translation.message_not_send: Your message was not send because of an error
translation.message_not_send_item-not-found: Your message was not send because this room does not exist
translation.message_not_send_forbidden: Your message was not send because you have no voice in this room
translation.message_not_send_not-acceptable: Your message was not send because you are no occupant of this room
translation.You_are_not_on_the_member_list: You are not on the member list
translation.You_are_banned_from_this_room: You are banned from this room
translation.Your_desired_nickname_: Your desired nickname is already in use. Please choose another
translation.The_maximum_number_: The maximum number of user is reached in this room
translation.You_are_not_allowed_to_create_: You are not allowed to create a room
translation.PermissionDeniedError: You or your browser denied audio/video permission
translation.You_received_a_message_from_an_unknown_s: You received a message from an unknown sender (__sender__) Do you want to display them?
translation.Your_roster_is_empty_add_: Your roster is empty, add a new contact
translation.onsmp_explanation_question: You contact is attempting to determine if they are really talking to you. To authenticate to your contact,  enter the answer and click Answer.
translation.onsmp_explanation_secret: You contact is attempting to determine if they are really talking to you. To authenticate to your contact,  enter the secret.
translation.Do_you_want_to_change_the_default_room_c: Do you want to change the default room configuration?
translation.setting-explanation-carbon: With enabled carbon copy your XMPP server will send a copy of every incoming message for you to this client even if it was not addressed to it.
translation.setting-explanation-login: If this option is enabled, the chat will start on login.
translation.setting-explanation-priority: If you are logged in multiple times with the same account, your XMPP server will deliver messages to the client with the highest priority.
translation.setting-explanation-xmpp: These options are used to connect to the XMPP server.
